SLIM

Signals, Learning and Imaging Research Group

Who We Are

We are a team of researchers (graduate students, postdocs, and undergraduates) led by Dr. Saiprasad (Sai) Ravishankar in the Department of Computational Mathematics, Science and Engineering at Michigan State University and work on problems in computational imaging, image reconstruction, machine learning, signal processing, and optimization.

SLIM focuses particularly on smart imaging systems with the development of models and machine learning methods & theory, forming a bedrock of some of the groupâ€™s efforts.
